sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../../styles/Toolbar.css'; const Toolbar = ({ onSave, onPreview, onGenerateCode, viewMode, onViewModeChange, onUndo, onRedo, canUndo, canRedo, zoomLevel, onZoom, onToggleGrid, showGrid, gridSize, pageData, onSetGridSize, selectedElement, onSelectElement, onShowAddSectionGuide, guideLine, }) => { return (
{zoomLevel}%
onSetGridSize(Number(e.target.value))} style={{ width: '60px' }} />
); }; export default Toolbar;
